overview: Patrick Lauzon was responsible for launching Mediative, and now holds the position of President. One of the early players in Canada’s online marketing industry, Patrick has distinguished himself over the years by demonstrating a unique sense of leadership and innovation. Before Mediative, Patrick has held executive positions at Sun Media, Canoe.ca, Sympatico/MSN and Bell Canada. He is currently a Chairman of the board of Acquisio. He was also a board member and chair for IAB Canada and has served on the boards of My Virtual Paper and LIPSO. A graduate of Concordia, Patrick also attended Northwestern University, Harvard Law School and the MIT Sloan School of Management. He was recognized by Marketing magazine as one of Canada’s Top 100 future leaders of opinion and has featured on Canada’s prestigious Top 40 Under 40™ list. He has also played an active role in the start-up community by (among other ventures) starting Founders & Funders, an event that matches entrepreneurs with investors.
